item.description:
SYNOPSIS:
A drama centered on a rising country-music songwriter (Hedlund) who sparks with a fallen star (Paltrow). Together, they mount his ascent and her comeback, which leads to romantic complications involving her husband/manager (McGraw) and a beauty queen-turned-singer (Meester).

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet).

After the movie, we'll head to a restaurant to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for there!

--Michelle

NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:25, so let's meet in the lobby at 6:55 pm to buy tickets and head inside. I will check RSVPs for the last time around 5 pm. If you change your RSVP after that or if you are running late, please call 978-857-3734.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my cell and be wear a silver down coat (it's winter!).
item.name: Country Strong
